title: Knox
description: Prison is no joke.The food sucks,My roommate snores,And the only thing I have to look forward to is Monroe.My lawyer can look at my briefs anytime.She’s smart, beautiful, and the only way I’m getting out of this hellhole.I didn’t kill Blaze, but when you’re a Dead Soul MC member, no one cares about the truth.And maybe that’s for the best,Because no one can know about Canyon.Monroe is not just getting me out of jail,She’s also getting into my heart.Knox is the first book in the Dead Souls MC Series. All of the books in this series are currently available!
author: Savannah Rylan
